Name: Vengeful Castle
About the game: Vengeful Castle is a survival game with Hack and Slash game play style. Combine various skills and items to defeat the incoming enemies. Features in Early Access Defeat enemies by using magic and sword. ◆ 67 Spells ◆ 19 Items ◆ 14 Enemies ◆ 5 Bosses ◆ 3 stages with each different obstacles ◆ Enemy power increases by Difficulty Level
